# Email Configuration for OTP Verification
# Replace these values with your actual email credentials

# Gmail SMTP Configuration
EMAIL_USER=your-email@gmail.com
EMAIL_PASS=your-app-password

# Server Configuration
PORT=3001

# Instructions:
# 1. Create a Gmail account or use existing one
# 2. Enable 2-factor authentication
# 3. Generate an App Password:
#    - Go to Google Account settings
#    - Security > 2-Step Verification > App passwords
#    - Generate password for "Mail"
# 4. Copy the generated password to EMAIL_PASS
# 5. Copy your email to EMAIL_USER
# 6. Create a .env file with these values
